name: Par One Hundred One
description:
A giant 101 Par mini golf game for the Mini Jam 86: Sports game Jam!

The theme was sports, and the limitation "No stopping" so we have golf with a penalty timer if you don't make a shot in 5 seconds.

Code and art by Jake Kerr*

Music and Sound by Josh Kerr* [Soundcloud]

* Some small sounds and graphics were collected from free license sources, I want to collect the credits and add them here as well.
